recommendations.recommendation: Trully for mecha fans only. If you are looking for a mecha anime that you would rewatch, or just enjoy it without starting to question it while watching, then look elsewhere. Argevollen is just a plain mecha anime...
I believe this is for fans only. Up until eps 9 the story is not engaging enough for me. So, I am dropping this for now. Sorry.

anime.description: The Kingdom of Arandas Alliance and the Countries Unification of Ingelmia have been at war for many years. The situation has been at a stalemate across the fortress of the Great Wall, which has never been penetrated since the foundation of Arandas. The gate to the fortress has remained firmly closed, but when it creaks open, the complexity of war starts to change dramatically. Source: Crunchyroll

tag.name: robot
tag.description: A robot is an automatically guided machine, able to do tasks on its own. Another common characteristic is that by its appearance or movements, a robot often conveys a sense that it has intent or agency of its own. Not to be confused with android (human-like robot).

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

Disasters have substantial, long-lasting negative repercussions, and great effort must be spent in order to undo or mitigate their effects.

tag.name: war
tag.description: War is a phenomenon of organized violent conflict, typified by extreme aggression, societal disruption and adaptation, and high mortality. The objective of warfare differs in accord with a group`s role in a conflict: The goals of offensive warfare are typically the submission, assimilation or destruction of another group, while the goals of defensive warfare are simply the repulsion of the offensive force and, often, survival itself. Relative to each other, combatants in warfare are called enemies. The terms military, militant, and militarism each refer to fundamental aspects of war, i.e. the organized group, the combative individual, and the supportive ethos (respectively). Source: wiki

This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Nanjou Reika
character.description: Elder sister of Susumu whom he been searching for when he joined 8th squad. They both have different last names because Susumu is carrying his mother`s maiden name unlike his sister.

character.name: Namie Portman
character.description: Test pilot of the of the Seiran ZTK5 and former underclassman of Tokimune in his mobile weapons study course and is friends with Tokimune since then. She is the newest pilot to join squad 8.

episode.title: 帰還
Return
Rapatriement
Kikan
episode.summary: The successful retreat at the Gate of No Retreat brings the Ingelmian advance to a halt, and puts the war into a stalemate. As Ingelmia tries to secure an invasion route, Arandas is forced to rebuild its army. The 8th Unit is officially given Argevollen, and Jamie is ordered to remain with them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワンマン・アーミー
One Man Army
Une armée à lui tout seul
One Man Army
episode.summary: The 8th Unit fights off their pursuers and unites with the main force. At the Gate of No Retreat, a fortress between the two countries, they are given the mission to support the forces` retreat and close the gate. In the middle of the operation, Tokimune encounters an enemy ace pilot. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目覚め
Awakening
Éveil
Mezame
episode.summary: Tokimune, acting on his own, has driven them far off route, and the Independent 8th Attack Unit is forced to break through enemy lines. Tokimune has been registered as the Argevollen`s pilot, and is sent into the next battle without time to recover from his first. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遭遇
Encounter
Rencontre
Souguu
episode.summary: Ingelmia invades Arandas in the name of liberating the people, and pushes the Arandas army back to their fortress known as the Great Wall. The Independent 8th Attack Unit, which is stationed far to the east, is summoned to join the desperate battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再戦
Rematch
Revanche
Saisen
episode.summary: Samonji remembers an experiment that once took place in Bellhals. He meets Tokimune and Jamie in a field filled with sunflowers. Richthofen begins a decoy attack in Bellhals to allow for a full-scale assault elsewhere. The 8th Unit detects him and attacks on their own. In what`s supposed to be a neutral zone, Tokimune and Richthofen face off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 陸繋島[ベルハルス]
Bellhals
La presqu`île Bellhals
Beruharusu
episode.summary: The 8th Unit destroys the Ingelmian base in the Gatar mountains. For their next mission they go to resupply at Bellhals, and enjoy a short rest. Jamie and Tokimune stay behind, while everyone else is out, to update the Argevollen. Meanwhile, Richthofen can be seen in a Bellhals port district... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走れ, ジェイミー!
Run, Jamie!
Cours, Jamie !
Hashire, Jamie!
episode.summary: Unforeseen trouble brings the entirety of the enemy`s firepower down on the 8th Unit. But Argevollen, the core of the mission, shuts down and is exposed to vicious long-range artillery fire. Samonji comes up with a plan to continue the mission and protect his men. Jamie runs towards the battlefield to restart Argevollen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奇襲
Surprise Attack
Attaque-surprise
Kishuu
episode.summary: The Ingelmia forces split and attempt to attack the Arandas capital from multiple directions. The fastest advance is in the Gatar mountains, so the 8th Unit is sent there. A plan is drawn up to destroy the enemy`s forward base, and Tokimune is given an important role. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナンジョウ・レイカ
Reika Nanjou
Reika Nanjô
Nanjou Reika
episode.summary: Eight years ago, Samonji and Suzushiro are assigned to security at an Arandas Trail Krieger research station. Reika Nanjou is a test pilot there. She wants to make an army where nobody dies and is partiipating in tests for a revolutionary system to use unmanned units. The project is going well, but the units go out of control during a demonstration for military leadership... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 拳[いかり]
Rage
Colère
Ikari
episode.summary: The 8th Unit holds a party to celebrate their success at Wishpe. As everyone enjoys themselves, Tokimune is told by Samonji about his sister and the experiment she participated in. "I`m the one who killed your sister," says Samonji, and Tokimune is infuriated. Samonji was told that Tokimune`s sister was Reika Nanjou, a girl he knew. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不在の果て
End of Absence
Conséquences de l`absence
Fuzai no Hate
episode.summary: The Independent 8th Unit has destroyed Zong base and stopped Ingelmia`s assault. They take a short break in Wishpe when an order comes in that an enemy is attacking. Suzushiro and Samonji have left for the capital so Okui is forced to take command. He fights to protect his hometown and the people who live there. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 約束
Promise
Promesse
Yakusoku
episode.summary: Tokimune finally decides to take a step forward as a soldier. His Argevollen is called the Demon of Arandas by the Ingelmians because of its incredible power. The 8th Unit attacks the Zong base where forces are gathering for an attack on Arandas. They begin a surprise attack to cut-off the full-scale assault. At the base they`re attacking is Richthofen`s old friend, Daniels... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青と藍
Blue and Indigo
Bleu et indigo
Ao to Ai
episode.summary: Unit 8 is given the latest technology: the Seiran. The 8th is now far stronger, and is also given a new pilot. Namie Portman: a fellow student of Tokimune`s and a new test pilot. She is talented by nervous and overreliant on her manuals. The 8th is given an order to attack. Having someone under his command changes Tokimune... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凍結
Freeze
Gelé
Touketsu
episode.summary: Samonji forbids Tokimune from piloting the Argevollen. Tokimune listens to a recording of himself going out of control and attacking his own allies, and Samonji tells him a shocking truth: the Argevollen is based off the unit that killed his sister. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嵐[シュトゥルーム]
Sturm
Sturm
Storm
episode.summary: The Kitazamahara base is wiped out in the battle between the Argevollen and the new enemy unit. The 8th retreats to Pudder base to recover and regroup. They chart a course through an abandoned industrial city, and bait the "Ghost" into attacking, but in the ensuing battle Tokimune loses control. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 亡霊
Ghost
Fantôme
Bourei
episode.summary: Arandas forces are being wiped out in border areas. Each force is wiped out completely, with no survivors. The army has taken to calling the attacker the "Ghost." The 8th is stationed in Kitazamahara to counterattack this new enemy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特別編 独立第八部隊 激戦の軌跡
Episode S1
Dokuritsu Dai Hachibutai: Gekisen no Kiseki
もうひとつの意識
Another Mind
Une autre conscience
Mou Hitotsu no Ishiki
episode.summary: The Perphevollens have been put into combat. Samonji has left the 8th Unit to lead them. They`re pushing back the Ingelmia army and winning many battles. Meanwhile, the 8th enjoys a short break at a northwestern supply base, but the troops are uneasy... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決意
Resolve
Détermination
Ketsui
episode.summary: Arandas and Ingelmia both want to make peace to end the stalemate. Samonji is brought out by Cayenne, who tells him that if the war ends like this, all the sacrifices will have been for nothing. Cayenne shows him a line of Perfevollens, mass-produced Argevollen units, and asks him to make a choice. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 訣別
Farewell
Séparation
Ketsubetsu
episode.summary: The 8th Unit successfuly retreats after a fierce battle with the Sturm Alpha. But Tokimune collapses after leaving the Argevollen, and is in a coma. Jamie blames herself for not being able to stop him, and Samonji says that he`s been defeated. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敗北
Defeat
Défaite
Haiboku
episode.summary: The 8th Unit withdraws from the Pudder supply base as a huge legion advances. Samonji refuses to allow the Argevollen to launch, despite the fact that they`re outnumbered, but Cayenne puts pressure on him. And when the Sturm Alpha shows up, he no longer has a choice. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白銀の意思
Silver Will
La volonté d`argent
Shirogane no Ishi
episode.summary: Cayenne retakes the Great Wall when Ingelmia retreats. But Samonji`s U-Link squad leaves the fortress and advances upon the retreating Ingelmia troops. In a chaotic battlefield with Arandas and Ingelmia fighting each other, the 8th chases Samonji. Tokimune and Jamie desperately hang on to get back Argevollen, and head for Samonji! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反撃
Counterattack
Contre-attaque
Hangeki
episode.summary: By deliberately leaking information, Cayenne is able to capture the enemy Sturm Betas. The U-Link squad is now much more powerful, and Samonji has broken through the Gate of No Retreat. Jamie and Tokimune swear they will get Argevollen back. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鹵獲
Capture
Butin
Rokaku
episode.summary: Cayenne rebels against the Arandas military, and Captain Samonji sides with him. The 8th Unit goes to stop Samonji, but Argevollen is captured instead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動乱
Disturbance
Rébellion
Douran
episode.summary: Ingelmia has introduced the Sturm Beta to counter the Perphevollens. The tide of battle turns towards Ingelmia`s side again. General Cayenne, disgusted with the other generals desire for an easy peace, rebels against the Arandas government, with Samonji at his side. Source: crunchyroll
